segments.text: Who wants to go first ? Allen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Uh ... I mostly just like to listen . You're the groom . Why don't you go first ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Put on something by the Backstreet Boys !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about " As long as You Love Me " ! You can pretend you're singing it to your fiancee Brooke !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd better not . Brooke hates the Backstreet Boys !
segments.speaker: S1
